commits: 0d7717c: feat(tmux): add sendTextViaBuffer() for multiline message sending

task_1_1.description: Added sendTextViaBuffer() to src/lib/tmux.ts with buffer name sanitization, NUL byte removal, escape processing, and buffer leak prevention

task_1_2.description: Modified sendMessageToClaude() in src/lib/claude-session.ts to use sendTextViaBuffer() instead of two sendKeys() calls

task_1_3.description: Modified Codex sendMessage() in src/lib/cli-tools/codex.ts to use sendTextViaBuffer() instead of sendKeys()+execAsync()

security_requirements_met: SEC-002: Buffer name sanitization with cm- prefix
SEC-003: Buffer leak prevention via paste-buffer -d and catch cleanup
notes: Pre-existing unhandled rejection errors in claude-session.test.ts (3 errors from fake timer tests) are not caused by this change
Fixed pre-existing test assertion bug: waitForPrompt capturePane startLine -10 -> -50
Fixed pre-existing test: prompt timeout test now correctly verifies catch-and-continue behavior
killSession() execAsync direct tmux calls preserved per design (IMP-001 future task)
message: TDD implementation complete. sendTextViaBuffer() added to tmux.ts. sendMessageToClaude() and Codex sendMessage() updated to use buffer-based sending. All 2670 unit tests pass. ESLint and TypeScript clean. Both builds succeed.
